mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SERIES ( series_name, cate_id, reg_dt, mod_dt ) VALUES ( #{ series_name }, #{ cate_id }, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT SERIES.*, COUNT(SERIES.series_name) as totCnt FROM COMPANY, CONTENTS, SERIES WHERE COMPANY.company_mgmtno = CONTENTS.company_mgmtno AND CONTENTS.series_mgmtno = SERIES.series_mgmtno AND COMPANY.company_mgmtno = #{ company_mgmtno } GROUP BY SERIES.series_name
SELECT * FROM SERIES WHERE series_mgmtno = #{ series_mgmtno }
